[h1]Call of Duty: Counter-Strike[/h1]

Having only ever played Counter-Strike as a child on Xbox, moving onto PC in my later years and revisiting this game is not only an honour and a privilege, but also mind-blowing. The scale and breadth of this instalment to the Counter-Strike series is killer. I hope to one day see a modern take on single player Counter-Strike. Playing Condition Zero and Deleted Scenes puts Call of Duty to shame, it's a very impressive; technically and graphically speaking. There are many missions here to give a try, so what are you waiting for?!

Klasyk, a do tego z trybem wykonywania misji z wyborem trudności, tryb multiplayer (choć już mało osób gra), no i boty, czego nie ma w zwykłym Counter-Strike. Plusem jest to, że przy zakupie otrzymujemy oprócz CS: CZ też CS: CZ wycięte sceny i Counter-Strike'a. Polecam, dobra giera ;)
melhor jogo que tinha na minha época.. joguei muito na infância e ainda é muito bom. saudades épocas de Lan house com os amigos.

Clássico! Pra quem procura uma versão um pouco mais "padrão" e sem mods do CS 1.6, com armas e skins melhores (em HD), com suportes à mapas e skins do CS 1.6 e campanha com bots nativamente (tanto em missões quanto no multiplayer) recomendo o CZ. O CZ é uma base para os Counter-Strike's que vieram depois, pode-se percerber pelas armas e skins, foi o "primeiro" CS q a Valve desenvolveu depois de comprar o mod do CS para Half-Life. Essa é uma análise bem superficial para entender o básico de diferença entre o 1.6 e o CZ.

I play all my games in solo, so seeing this game recommendation from a friend, I though I'd go ahead, and give it a try. Before I knew it, I became very fond of it. It had all the ingredients I judge a game by.

It's challenging, story immersive, graphically appealing, and the music score is fitting to the game, and its scenes. The combat is most challenging, and takes a great deal of practice to become a true pro:)

[h1] Counter-Strike: Condition Zero [/h1]

[b] A Very Sub-par, Single-player Focused Counter-Strike [/b]

[b] Counter Strike: Condition Zero [/b] sounded somewhat appealing to me on paper - a set of tactical missions with a customizable squad and loadouts filled with CS-style tactics. What I encountered instead was a very lackluster set of squad-based missions with irritating AI and a very pointless customization system.

This game has some nice ideas within it that should be a part of any modern day CS-style game. A squad-style mode with cooperative missions would be awesome to see in any title, especially one with the Counter-Strike gameplay loop. In this title, it is squandered on insanely irritable squadmates and very basic tutorial-esque mission setups. While there is some customization in terms of loadouts and squadmates to choose from, the standout guns remain obvious and overpowered while the AI proves itself redundant, serving little more as a meat-shield for the player to hide behind.

The map design is essentially just playing on every map from the base game. There aren't really any major changes as far as I could care to look for, and it felt lazy. Sure, they played alright, but why would I want to play on these maps with AI when i could play with real people? (Note: there were no multiplayer servers available to me that had less than 200 ping, and I live in NA region)

The audio is at least pretty good, and the arsenal is also pretty interesting to play around with. With more polish and work put into this title, it really could have been a stand-out, smash-hit for Ritual, Turtle Rock, and Valve, but alas it was squandered and remains as a very forgettable CS experience. In the end, I would [b] Not Recommend [/b] playing [b] Counter-Strike: Condition Zero [/b] unless you are a very big CS fan and are desperate for some old-school content.

[h2] Final Verdict: 3/10 (Poor) [/h2]

If you enjoyed this review, feel free to check out my curator page for my thoughts on a variety of other games!

https://store.steampowered.com/curator/37542043-ADHD-Reviews/

of course i would recommend, im a huge fan of all counter strikes, if ur collecting this one only to have it like i did, sure go for it, it is only 89 cents when its on sale, so why not, but i wont recommend buying this for actual playing it only if u got friends that also play this but that would be unreal, the community is small and it's becoming smaller every day, it is an old game guys

Lamentablemente hay gente que odia este titulo porque dicen que solo es el counter strike 1.6 pero con un mod de graficos.
Esa gente que dice eso, es muy ignorante, no sabe que cs condition zero fue el plato liviano para despues asombrar al mundo con counter strike source, se que cuando salio no fue algun bien recibido, pero hoy en dia es uno de los mejores counter strike que existen.
Condition Zero fue la infancia de muchisimas personas, al igual que yo, la verdad es que me siento mucho mas conforme y nostalgico jugando a este counter, porque sus jugadores no son chiteros como los de 1.6, no te kickean de todos los servidores como 1.6.
Realmente recomiendo este counter porque es mucho mas completo.

There are better graphics than the original one, and it is what started it all. Especially because of the new models textures etc. Definitely worth the money.
